title: RemoteOK Job Scraper Input
description: Scrape remote job listings from RemoteOK.com using their JSON API. Filter by keywords, location, and job posting date.

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Keyword to filter jobs (e.g., 'python', 'developer', 'designer'). If empty, all jobs will be returned. The keyword is matched against job titles, companies, descriptions, and tags.

location.title: Location Filter
location.description: Filter jobs by location (e.g., 'San Francisco', 'New York', 'Remote'). Case-insensitive partial matching.

maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: Maximum number of jobs to collect from the API. The API returns all jobs in one request.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for accessing RemoteOK API. Recommended to use Apify Proxy to avoid potential rate limiting.
